python-jsmapper
===============
|travis|_ |coveralls|_ |pypibadge|_

-----
About
-----
A Object - JSON Schema Mapper.

-------
Install
-------

.. code:: shell

  $ pip install jsmapper

Or

.. code:: shell

  $ python setup.py install

-------------
Run the tests
-------------

.. code:: shell

  $ tox

-------
License
-------
python-jsmapper is licensed under the MIT LICENSE.  See ./LICENSE.rst.
